parameters.name: BridgeArn
parameters.description: TheAmazon Resource Name (ARN) of the bridge that you want to update.

parameters.name: EgressGatewayBridge
parameters.description: A cloud-to-ground bridge. The content comes from an existing MediaConnect flow and is delivered to your premises. MaxBitrate (integer) --- The maximum expected bitrate (in bps).

parameters.name: IngressGatewayBridge
parameters.description: A ground-to-cloud bridge. The content originates at your premises and is delivered to the cloud. MaxBitrate (integer) --- The maximum expected bitrate (in bps). MaxOutputs (integer) --- The maximum number of expected outputs.

nested_params.name: MaxOutputs
nested_params.description: The maximum number of expected outputs.

parameters.name: SourceFailoverConfig
parameters.description: The settings for source failover. FailoverMode (string) --- The type of failover you choose for this flow. MERGE combines the source streams into a single stream, allowing graceful recovery from any single-source loss. FAILOVER allows switching between different streams. RecoveryWindow (integer) --- Recovery window time to look for dash-7 packets. SourcePriority (dict) --- The priority you want to assign to a source. You can have a primary stream and a backup stream or two equally prioritized streams. PrimarySource (string) --- The name of the source you choose as the primary source for this flow. State (string) --- The state of source failover on the flow. If the state is inactive, the flow can have only one source. If the state is active, the flow can have one or two sources.

nested_params.name: FailoverMode
nested_params.description: The type of failover you choose for this flow. MERGE combines the source streams into a single stream, allowing graceful recovery from any single-source loss. FAILOVER allows switching between different streams.

nested_params.name: RecoveryWindow
nested_params.description: Recovery window time to look for dash-7 packets.

nested_params.name: SourcePriority
nested_params.description: The priority you want to assign to a source. You can have a primary stream and a backup stream or two equally prioritized streams.

nested_params.name: PrimarySource
nested_params.description: The name of the source you choose as the primary source for this flow.

nested_params.name: State
nested_params.description: The state of source failover on the flow. If the state is inactive, the flow can have only one source. If the state is active, the flow can have one or two sources.

nested_items.name: BridgeArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the bridge.

nested_items.name: BridgeMessages
nested_items.description: Messages with details about the bridge.

nested_items.name: Code
nested_items.description: The error code.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: The specific error message that MediaConnect returns to help you understand the reason that the request did not succeed.

nested_items.name: ResourceName
nested_items.description: The name of the resource.

nested_items.name: BridgeState
nested_items.description: The state of the bridge.

nested_items.name: EgressGatewayBridge
nested_items.description: An egress bridge is a cloud-to-ground bridge. The content comes from an existing MediaConnect flow and is delivered to your premises.

nested_items.name: InstanceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the instance running this bridge.

nested_items.name: MaxBitrate
nested_items.description: The maximum expected bitrate (in bps) of the egress bridge.

nested_items.name: IngressGatewayBridge
nested_items.description: An ingress bridge is a ground-to-cloud bridge. The content originates at your premises and is delivered to the cloud.

nested_items.name: InstanceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the instance running this bridge.

nested_items.name: MaxBitrate
nested_items.description: The maximum expected bitrate (in bps) of the ingress bridge.

nested_items.name: MaxOutputs
nested_items.description: The maximum number of outputs on the ingress bridge.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the bridge.

nested_items.name: Outputs
nested_items.description: The outputs on this bridge.

nested_items.name: FlowOutput
nested_items.description: The output of the associated flow.

nested_items.name: FlowArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the cloud flow.

nested_items.name: FlowSourceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the flow source.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the bridge's output.

nested_items.name: NetworkOutput
nested_items.description: The network output for the bridge.

nested_items.description: The network output IP address.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The network output name.

nested_items.name: NetworkName
nested_items.description: The network output's gateway network name.

nested_items.name: Port
nested_items.description: The network output's port.

nested_items.name: Protocol
nested_items.description: The network output protocol.

nested_items.name: Ttl
nested_items.description: The network output TTL.

nested_items.name: PlacementArn
nested_items.description: The placement Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the bridge.

nested_items.name: SourceFailoverConfig
nested_items.description: The settings for source failover.

nested_items.name: FailoverMode
nested_items.description: The type of failover you choose for this flow. MERGE combines the source streams into a single stream, allowing graceful recovery from any single-source loss. FAILOVER allows switching between different streams.

nested_items.name: RecoveryWindow
nested_items.description: Search window time to look for dash-7 packets.

nested_items.name: SourcePriority
nested_items.description: The priority you want to assign to a source. You can have a primary stream and a backup stream or two equally prioritized streams.

nested_items.name: PrimarySource
nested_items.description: The name of the source you choose as the primary source for this flow.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of source failover on the flow. If the state is inactive, the flow can have only one source. If the state is active, the flow can have one or two sources.

nested_items.description: The sources on this bridge.

nested_items.description: The settings related to the multicast source.
